title: Administrative Professional - Short Form
description: Assesses administrative support skills including organization, communication, and basic computer proficiency.

title: Retail Sales Associate Solution
description: Focuses on product knowledge, upselling, and customer engagement in retail environments.

title: Cognitive Ability Test
description: Evaluates problem-solving, critical thinking, and logical reasoning skills across various domains.

title: JavaScript Programming Test
description: Assesses proficiency in JavaScript programming, including functions, objects, DOM manipulation, and modern ES6+ features.

title: Leadership Assessment
description: Evaluates leadership potential, decision-making skills, and ability to motivate and direct teams.
